[‚Üê Back to commands index](./)

See your OSRS xp.

**Usage**

- `/xp rsn:<string> [to_99:<boolean>]`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `rsn` | `string` | Yes | The RuneScape username to check | - |
| `to_99` | `boolean` | No | Only show xp remaining until level 99. | - |

**Examples**

- `/xp rsn:Magnaboy`
